BoomingBootloader.Jailbreak: One creature of your choice within 10 feet of the creature you summoned must succeed at a Will save against your spell DC or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure).

DebugSpell.Jailbreak: Any die you roll for damage that has a result lower than 3 becomes a result of 3 instead.

DeleteRootAccess.Jailbreak: If the construct or tech creature succeeds at its save but doesn't critically succeed, it is your minion for 1 round. If the construct fails its save, it is your minion for 10 minutes. If it critically fails, it is your minion for 24 hours.

GrenadeSpell.Jailbreak: You can install any spell into a grenade. In that case, creatures roll a separate saving throw against your spell DC if it's not a Reflex save. If you apply the effects of this spellshape to a spell with a basic Reflex save, you can use your spell DC instead of your class DC for the grenade.

HardlightIllusion.Jailbreak: If you use Jailbreak Spell to use this spellshape and modify an illusion spell that deals mental damage, that spell deals another appropriate type of damage based on the type of illusion. This damage does not need to be nonlethal, can deactivate regeneration, and otherwise functions like normal damage.

IncognitoSpell.Jailbreak: You can attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{Demoralize} one creature using Arcana instead of Intimidation by making the effects of the spell seem effortless on your part.

OvervoltResistor.Jailbreak: You deal damage equal to your level even if the target is immune to acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic damage. Only ignore the first listed immunity this way, even if the target has immunities to multiple listed damage types.

SafemodeSpell.Jailbreak: You can choose to make the spell an illusion that deals nonlethal mental damage. If the spell requires a Fortitude or Reflex save, it becomes a Will save. If the spell requires a spell attack roll against AC, you make your spell attack roll against the target's Will DC instead. The spell gains the illusion and mental traits.

ShatterSpell.Jailbreak: You can deal damage to every creature in the area of the spell effect or adjacent to the targeted magic item, or you can deal 1d6 damage Ã— the target's counteract rank instead of 1d4 damage.

SignalBoost.Jailbreak: Increase that spell's range by 60 feet. As is standard for increasing spell ranges, if the spell normally has a range of touch, you extend its range to 60 feet.

SplitTunneling.Jailbreak: If you fail to affect your primary target (whether your attack fails or the target is immune to the spell), your secondary target becomes your primary target, taking full damage and all effects of the spell.
